hadiths.text: Narrated `A'isha:The Prophet (ﷺ) used to offer his night prayer while I was sleeping across in his bed. Whenever he intended to offer the witr prayer, he used to wake me up and I would offer the witr prayer too

chapter.ara-name: باب إِيقَاظِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم أَهْلَهُ بِالْوِتْرِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) used to wake his family up for the Witr prayer
